full_transcript: Focusing solely on the price per gram misses the bigger picture: ROI through weight reduction. For a defense contractor, every kilogram saved translates to better fuel efficiency and higher payload capacity. Over the five-year lifecycle of a vehicle, Hexenon-X doesn't just pay for itself—it creates significant operational savings that traditional, cheaper materials simply can't match. It’s an investment in efficiency.
